tool_description: Validates submission packages against regulatory compliance checklists and identifies missing or non-compliant elements.

submission_package_path.description: Path to the submission package to validate

error_messages: Invalid submission package: Package path is inaccessible or corrupted
Unsupported jurisdiction: Specify a recognized regulatory authority
Invalid submission type: Use a supported submission type
Invalid validation level: Use basic, comprehensive, or critical_path
Checklist not found: The specified checklist version is not available
usage: Provide submission package path, jurisdiction, and submission type to perform comprehensive compliance validation against regulatory requirements.

non_compliant_items.description: List of non-compliant elements requiring correction
